message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you first. I think it could really benefit you.  I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. Could we discuss something closer to $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I understand your position, Alice. I'll try to be more flexible. How about we set the product price at $10,500?
